rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with wide doorways and ramp leading directly into the open living area.

rooms.name: Living Room & Home Theater
rooms.description: Dual-purpose room serving as living area and home theater. Incorporates Vastu principles by orienting seating towards the east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with wheelchair-accessible counters and appliances. Positioned adjacent to the dining area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining space integrated within the living area, ensuring ease of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with accessible walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom on a split-level plan.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light, following Vastu guidelines with proper directionality.
